Posts.Content: Liven5 wrote: Hi, I just received my first chemo Monday, from Tuesday on, I've had a headache, which is just getting worst.  I called the doctor yesterday, and she gave me a script for Ibuprofen, 800 mg., and to take Claritin.  Neither has helped.  I called yesterday after 2 hrs. from taking my first dose, telling them this, and she said after 3 doses should be better.  Well, it's not.  The pain is so great, by my temples, it's so bad I cry at times.  Today's Saturday, do I just get thru it as I have been, in great pain, or go to the ER?  They said it was from the cyclophosphamide, and next time they will slow it down.  Why did they take a chance this time?  Any help, recommendations?  Thanks, Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Extreme headache after first chemo, advice? Liven5 TWills
Extreme headache after first chemo, advice? Liven5 TWills
